evidence.text: 5 | 2025-06-27 | EXPEDITED MOTION (1) Request for Hearing; (2) Temporary Restraining Order; and (3) Preliminary Injunction re 1 Complaint, by Center for Biological Diversity, Friends of the Everglades, Inc..

extracted.value: On June 27, 2025, Center for Biological Diversity and Friends of the Everglades, Inc. filed an Expedited Motion requesting a Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction against Kevin Guthrie, Todd Lyons, Miami-Dade County, and Kristi Noem.

evidence.text: 31 | 2025-07-11 | EXPEDITED MOTION expedited ruling on preliminary injunction motion re 5 EXPEDITED MOTION (1) Request for Hearing; (2) Temporary Restraining Order; and (3) Preliminary Injunction re 1 Complaint, by Center for Biological Diversity, Friends of the Everglades, Inc..

extracted.value: On July 11, 2025, Center for Biological Diversity and Friends of the Everglades, Inc. filed an Expedited Motion seeking an expedited ruling on their Preliminary Injunction Motion (DE 5) against Kevin Guthrie, Todd Lyons, Miami-Dade County, and Kristi Noem.

evidence.text: 40 | 2025-07-17 | EXPEDITED MOTION Temporary Restraining Order re 5 EXPEDITED MOTION (1) Request for Hearing; (2) Temporary Restraining Order; and (3) Preliminary Injunction re 1 Complaint, by Center for Biological Diversity, Friends of the Everglades, Inc..

extracted.value: On July 17, 2025, Center for Biological Diversity and Friends of the Everglades, Inc. filed an Expedited Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order, renewing their request from DE 5, against Kevin Guthrie, Todd Lyons, Miami-Dade County, and Kristi Noem.

evidence.text: 99 | 2025-08-05 | TRIAL BRIEF PLAINTIFFS' PRE-HEARING BRIEF by Center for Biological Diversity, Friends of the Everglades, Inc., Miccosukee Tribe of Indians of Florida.

extracted.value: On August 5, 2025, Center for Biological Diversity, Friends of the Everglades, Inc., and Miccosukee Tribe of Indians of Florida filed a Trial Brief (Plaintiffs' Pre-Hearing Brief) in support of their Motion for Preliminary Injunction, scheduled for hearing on August 6, 2025.

evidence.text: 100 | 2025-08-05 | Defendant's MOTION to Strike / Exclude Plaintiffs' Expert Dillon N. Reio by Kevin Guthrie.

extracted.value: On August 5, 2025, Kevin Guthrie filed a Motion to Strike Plaintiffs' Expert Dillon N. Reio, seeking to exclude the expert testimony related to the preliminary injunction motion.

evidence.text: 125 | 2025-08-15 | MOTION for Leave to File Amicus Curiae Brief by Mark Robert Schlakman.

extracted.value: On August 15, 2025, Mark Robert Schlakman filed a Motion for Leave to File an Amicus Curiae Brief, requesting permission to submit a brief supporting the Plaintiffs' position in the case.

evidence.text: 137 | 2025-08-23 | Defendant's EXPEDITED MOTION To Stay Preliminary Injunction Pending Appeal re 131 Order on Expedited Motion by Kevin Guthrie.

extracted.value: On August 23, 2025, Kevin Guthrie filed an Expedited Motion to Stay the Preliminary Injunction Pending Appeal, arguing that the injunction should be stayed while the appeal is pending.

evidence.text: 138 | 2025-08-23 | EXPEDITED MOTION to Stay Preliminary Injunction Pending Interlocutory Appeal by Todd Lyons, Kristi Noem.

extracted.value: On August 23, 2025, Todd Lyons and Kristi Noem filed an Expedited Motion to Stay the Preliminary Injunction Pending Interlocutory Appeal, seeking to halt the injunction during the appeal process.
